titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices, a proclamation ... whereas we have received information that a great number of persons have frequently of late assembled themselves together, and committed great outrages and riots in the county of Kent ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Other title information taken from first three lines of text.
"Tho. Cantuar, J. Sommers. C. Sunderland. Romney, Orford."
"Given at the court at Whitehall the seventeenth day of September, 1697. In the ninth year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb
